name: On Earth As It Is In Heaven - A Kinetic Novel
description: Sencil is a scribe in heaven that works for the God of Calamities. However, as he is kind of heart, he has repeatedly lowered or completely negated the casualties of disasters ordered by the God of Calamities. A kinetic novel that has about 3 hours worth of immersive writing!
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: XP 處理器: 512 MB 顯示卡: 1920X1080 備註: Any potato can run this
